text: Hey all, wanted to put this to the group, if anyone knows of any web-focused sales reps who may be looking for a new opportunity, would really appreciate if you could share this listing: <https://smartbugmedia.applytojob.com/apply/Ttjs6D0QQN/Sales-Executive?referrer=20210524171129LWYLTHAKP6BILJ7L>
